Posts.Content: bohemiansol wrote: My sister was just diagnosed with "stage 4" breast cancer.  The cancer is in her breast, lungs,brain, liver and bone.  She has never been sick in her life and my mouth is still wide open.....  I've read and read and read.....  some optimistic some not sure.  The doctors are still deciding what they are going to do... in the meantime she is in the hospital waiting.....  is that what we do????  Wait??? lost  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: stage 4 breast cancer bohemiansol Katalin

Posts.Content: May 12, 2009 12:16AM bohemiansol wrote: My sister was just diagnosed with stage 4 breast cancer. It is in her brain, breast, lung, liver and bone. She has never been sick in her life!  I am overwhelmed!  We are waiting on doctors to explain what type of cancer, what chemotherapy to use, and any other details.  In the meantime she waits in a hospital.  I have read and read... some information optimistic some I just don't know.... so do we just wait???????
